articles.title: Wallabies vs Argentina, team news, Rob Leota, James O’Connor, Sean McMahon
articles.description: Rennie springs shock bolter in Wallabies pack as JO’C returns against Argentina
articles.content:
Sean McMahon’s international return will have to wait another week, after Dave Rennie sprung a surprise by naming Rob Leota for his run-on debut to face Argentina on Saturday.
While James O’Connor will play his first international of the year, with t... [3696 chars]

articles.title: Wallabies team announcement, Dave Rennie overlooks Sean McMahon and names Rob Leota for Rugby Championship game against Argentina
articles.description: Wallabies coach Dave Rennie doesn’t think James O’Connor would have the “wheels from fullback” in his return game from injury, so has opted to ease him back to international competition from the bench against Argentina this Saturday.
articles.content:
Wallabies coach Dave Rennie has overlooked a returning veteran in order to give a younger star his first start in the gold jersey.
Wallabies coach Dave Rennie doesn’t think James O’Connor would have the “wheels from fullback” in his return game from ... [4280 chars]

articles.title: UPDATE 2-Argentina makes $1.9 bln payment to IMF amid race for new deal
articles.description: Argentina made a near $1.9 billion payment to the International Monetary Fund on Wednesday, two government sources said, as the South American grains producer races to agree a new deal with the lender to revamp the over $40 billion it still owes.

articles.description: Mr Fix-it to start as Wallabies turn attention to Cheika’s Argentina
articles.content:
Dave Rennie has resisted the temptation of playing James O’Connor at fullback, with the dependability of Reece Hodge rewarded.
Hodge, 27, who has inherited the title of Mr Fix-it from Adam Ashley-Cooper will wear the No.15 jersey against Argentina on... [3597 chars]

articles.title: Argentina plans to spend $664 mln on fighter jets, possibly from China or U.S.
articles.description: Argentina is in the midst of the severe economic crisis that was exacerbated by the coronavirus pandemic. The ministry said the financing for the planned acquisition of the jets was outlined in the 2022 budget proposal that will be voted on in congress, where the governing coalition has a majority, in the coming weeks.
articles.content: Argentina is looking at buying up to $664 million-worth of multipurpose fighter jets to safeguard its airspace, the Defense Ministry said in a statement on Tuesday. A source with knowledge of the negotiations told Reuters that planes from China, the ... [629 chars]

articles.title: Argentina to make $1.9 bln payment to IMF, chipping away at debt
articles.description: Argentina will make a nearly $1.9 billion capital payment to the International Monetary Fund on Wednesday, according to two government sources and official news agency Telam, as the ailing South American grains producer continues to pay down the $45 billion it owes the fund.
